question:
You recently bought a new Television online,However when it arrived you found that it had a problem.You called the customer services,but were not satisfied with the responce.
Write a letter to the company ,In your letter.
Introduce yourself
Explain the situation.
Explain what you want the company to do.
text: I am writing this letter to make  a formal complaint about both a product I bought from your company and the poor level of service I received from the member of your customer office team.
I am a longtime and a loyal customer of your company,Jade Electronics.I have bought a number of items from you in recent years.Including a Television and a Tablet and I am based in Pakistan.

Last Wednesday,I bought a new Jade Electronics X10 Television from your website.It arrived at my house on Friday.But,when I opened the box I discovered that the front side was damaged.To be specific,There was a large crack across the screen.I immediately called your customer account team,But the work assistant I spoke to Mr Danish,accused me of causing the damage myself and lying about it.

As you can imagine this incident left me deeply distressed.I would really appreciate it If you could send me a replacement as soon as possible.I would also like to request an official apology letter from the member of staff responsible for treating me this way.
I look forward to hearing from you as soon as possible.
